description: Floss flower (Ageratum houstonianum) is an amazing species of flower due to its beautiful and lively display of bloom. It has petite, fluffy flowers that come in a range of vibrant colors, including blue, purple and white. The blooms look like miniature puffs of cotton candy, adding a whimsical and delicate feel to any garden. The floss flower grows well in temperatures from 65-70 degrees Fahrenheit and requires minimal maintenance. Its prolific blooms are known to last for months and can provide exceptional color to a garden for most of the growing season.
